case.title: gentleman offering rewarding friends with benefits - 39 (NYC)
case.text:
gentleman seeking to help out a fun female with a few monetary problems. Looking for a fun and rewarding friendship with a student or artist.
please be new to this. I am new to this as well. looking to meet someone cute, quirky and fun. want to make this long term and perhaps gain a "friendship". let's help each other out and just have fun :)
please send recent photos and description with your reply. It will help speed things up
